title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\GetIntentRequest
name: GetIntentRequest
description:
The request message for [Intents.GetIntent][google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.Intents.GetIntent].

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.GetIntentRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Required. The name of the intent. Format: projects/<Project ID>/agent/intents/<Intent ID>.

params.name: data.language_code
params.description: Optional. The language used to access language-specific data. If not specified, the agent's default language is used. For more information, see Multilingual intent and entity data.

params.name: data.intent_view
params.description: Optional. The resource view to apply to the returned intent.
